Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: We are grateful that the City of Oakland is holding Southwest accountable. We hope that Southwest policies and practices will finally change for good.
Unnamed Group of People.Name of Source: Southwest employees (via Transport Workers Union of America Local 555)
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: represented by Eric Swygert, an elected ramp representative with the Transport Workers Union of America Local 555

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: Southwest Airlines fully complies with applicable sick leave laws in Oakland and California, as well as with the terms of a December 2020 settlement agreement with the city.
Document Sources.Source Justification: statement from a Southwest spokesperson; reference to a December 2020 settlement agreement

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: The city attorney said Southwest’s practices were especially detrimental during the COVID-19 pandemic, when workers were forced to report to work even when they were sick.
Document Sources.Source Justification: press release from the city attorney

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: The City of Oakland is committed to protecting workers by ensuring that all employers in Oakland are complying with laws that protect their rights.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: authority on labor law enforcement in Oakland

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: We are grateful that the City of Oakland is holding Southwest accountable. We hope that Southwest policies and practices will finally change for good.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Elected Ramp Representative, Transport Workers Union of America Local 555

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: Southwest Airlines fully complies with applicable sick leave laws in Oakland and California, as well as with the terms of a December 2020 settlement agreement with the city.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: defendant in the lawsuit; largest carrier at San Francisco Bay Oakland International Airport

Named Organization Sources.Name of Source: Transport Workers Union of America Local 555
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: representing Southwest employees; providing a statement through an elected representative
plaintiff in the lawsuit; enforcer of labor laws in Oakland

Named Organization Sources.Name of Source: Oakland’s Department of Workforce Employment Standards
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: enforcer of wage and hour laws in Oakland; handler of worker complaints
